Title: Beyond 2000
Body: Beyond 2000 Our episode of `Beyond 2000' (entitled something like "Cooperating Robots of the Future") aired the following times on the Discovery Channel: Thursday, September 29, 10:00 pm, Eastern and Pacific Friday,   September 30,  1:00 am Saturday, October 1,     3:00 pm This show was the season premere, and our segment is the final segment of the show.
